summary.span: 提供高级加密标准 (AES) 算法的下一代加密技术 (CNG) 实现。

span.span: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) algorithm.

param.span: 枚举值的一个按位组合，这些值指定打开密钥的选项，例如打开密钥的位置（计算机或用户存储）以及是否取消 UI 提示。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify options for opening the key, such as where the key is opened from (machine or user storage) and whether to suppress UI prompting.

summary.span: 用当前键和初始化向量 () 创建对称 AES 解密器对象。

span.span: Creates a symmetric AES decryptor object with the current key and initialization vector ().

returns.span: 对称 AES 解密器对象。

span.span: A symmetric AES decryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会解密已加密的邮件使用创建重载具有相同的签名。This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the overload with the same signature.

param.name: rgbKey
param.span: 用于 AES 算法的密钥。

span.span: The secret key to use for the AES algorithm.

param.span: 密钥大小必须为 128、192 或 256 位。

span.span: The key size must be 128, 192, or 256 bits.

param.name: rgbIV
param.span: 用于 AES 算法的初始化向量。

span.span: The initialization vector to use for the AES algorithm.

summary.span: 用指定的密钥和初始化向量 (IV) 创建对称 AES 解密器对象。

span.span: Creates a symmetric AES decryptor object with the specified key and initialization vector (IV).

returns.span: 对称 AES 解密器对象。

span.span: A symmetric AES decryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会解密已加密的邮件使用创建重载具有相同的签名。This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the overload with the same signature. > [!NOTE] > 如果你已创建对象使用的现有的保留的密钥和你想要使用的密钥解密消息时，你想要设置属性，然后调用无参数重载改为; 否则为使用此方法将创建由指定一个暂时的密钥`rgbKey`参数。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key and you want to make use of that key when decrypting the message, you want to set the property and then call the parameterless overload instead; otherwise, using this method will create an ephemeral key as specified by the `rgbKey` parameter.

exception.span: 的大小对于此算法无效。

span.span: is not a valid size for this algorithm.
-or-

span.span: size does not match the block size for this algorithm.

exception.span: 是此算法的已知弱密钥，不能使用。

span.span: is a known weak key for this algorithm and cannot be used.
-or-
is .

summary.span: 使用当前键和初始化向量 () 创建对称 AES 加密器对象。

span.span: Creates a symmetric AES encryptor object using the current key and initialization vector ().

returns.span: 对称 AES 加密器对象。

span.span: A symmetric AES encryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于加密消息，然后使用重载具有相同的签名进行解密此方法的结果。Use this method to encrypt a message and then use the overload with the same signature to decrypt the result of this method.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateEncryptor (byte[] rgbKey, byte[] rgbIV);

abstract member CreateEncryptor : byte[] * byte[] -> System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform override this.CreateEncryptor : byte[] * byte[] -> System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform

param.name: rgbKey
param.span: 用于 AES 算法的密钥。

span.span: The secret key to use for the AES algorithm.

param.span: 密钥大小必须为 128、192 或 256 位。

span.span: The key size must be 128, 192, or 256 bits.

param.name: rgbIV
param.span: 用于 AES 算法的初始化向量。

span.span: The initialization vector to use for the AES algorithm.

summary.span: 用指定的密钥和初始化向量 (IV) 创建对称 AES 加密器对象。

span.span: Creates a symmetric AES encryptor object with the specified key and initialization vector (IV).

returns.span: 对称 AES 加密器对象。

span.span: A symmetric AES encryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于加密消息，然后使用重载具有相同的签名进行解密此方法的结果。Use this method to encrypt a message and then use the overload with the same signature to decrypt the result of this method. > [!NOTE] > 如果你已创建对象使用的现有的保留的密钥和你想要使用的密钥对消息进行加密时，你想要设置属性，然后调用无参数重载改为; 否则为使用此方法将创建由指定一个暂时的密钥`rgbKey`参数。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key and you want to make use of that key when encrypting the message, you want to set the property and then call the parameterless overload instead; otherwise, using this method will create an ephemeral key as specified by the `rgbKey` parameter.

span.span: size does not match the block size for this algorithm.

exception.span: 是此算法的已知弱密钥，不能使用。

span.span: is a known weak key for this algorithm and cannot be used.

Public Overrides Property Key As Byte()

member this.Key : byte[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 算法的密钥。

span.span: Gets or sets the key for the algorithm.
The key for the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你已创建对象使用的现有的保留的密钥，当读取的值时属性，将会进行尝试导出密钥。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key, when you read the value of the property, an attempt to export the key will be made. 在此情况下，如果键不是可导出，将引发。In this case, if the key is not exportable, a will be thrown. 除此之外，如果您设置的值属性，将无法再使用持久化的密钥并且将改为使用临时密钥。In addition to that, if you set the value of the property, the persisted key will no longer be used and a temporary key will be used instead. 如果您需要使用同样，持久化的密钥的新实例类需要创建。If you need to use the persisted key again, a new instance of class needs to be created.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int KeySize { get; set; }
.property instance int32 KeySize
Public Overrides Property KeySize As Integer
public: virtual property int KeySize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.KeySize : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 算法所用密钥的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the secret key used by the algorithm.

value.span: 算法所用密钥的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bits, of the secret key used by the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你已创建对象使用的现有的保留的密钥和的值设置属性，将无法再使用持久化的密钥并且将改为使用一个暂时的密钥。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key and you set the value of the property, the persisted key will no longer be used and an ephemeral key will be used instead. 如果您需要使用同样，持久化的密钥的新实例类需要创建。If you need to use the persisted key again, a new instance of class needs to be created.
